category.text: British Supporting Actor of the Year

notes.plainText: "You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger darling."

category.text: Best Actor in a Motion Picture

notes.plainText: Bale and Hardy face off as Batman and masked menace Bane, brawling beneath Gotham City's underbelly in a sewage smack-down marking the end of a trilogy.
